tasks.title: Setup Development Environment
tasks.description: Initialize the project with the required development environment and tooling as specified in the PRD.
tasks.details:
1. Install Node.js v20.2.1 and Yarn
2. Install Expo CLI v7.14.0 globally
3. Create a new React Native project using Expo TypeScript template
4. Initialize Git repository with proper .gitignore
5. Configure ESLint, Prettier, and TypeScript
6. Set up project structure following Expo best practices
7. Create README.md with setup instructions
8. Configure package.json with required dependencies

Code example for initialization:
```bash
# Install dependencies
npm install -g expo-cli@7.14.0

# Create new project
npx create-expo-app astrophysicals --template expo-template-typescript
cd astrophysicals

# Install dev dependencies
yarn add -D eslint prettier @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin @typescript-eslint/parser eslint-plugin-react eslint-plugin-react-native
```
tasks.testStrategy:
Verify that the development environment is correctly set up by running:
1. `node --version` should output v20.2.1
2. `yarn --version` should output the correct version
3. `expo --version` should output 7.14.0
4. `yarn start` should successfully launch the Expo development server
5. Ensure TypeScript compilation works without errors
6. Verify ESLint and Prettier configurations work correctly
